subtitle: Lean rump steak stuffed with prawns and a seafood sauce.

method.text: Cut a pocket or slit in the inside of each steak large enough to hold 25 g peeled prawns. Stuff each piece of steak with the prawns.

Cook the steaks under a preheated grill or barbecue griddle for 2-3 min on each side for medium to rare steaks and 3-4 min each side for a well done steak. Keep warm on hot serving plates. Keep warm on hot serving plates.

In a saucepan, add the shallots, vinegar, stock, seasoning and prawn shells. Bring to the boil and reduce by <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub>. Strain the sauce through a fine sieve. Season and pour a little over each steak. Garnish with whole prawns.

title: Surf and turf steaks
